revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The decisions of the Lords of Council and Session, from June 6th, 1678, to July 30th, 1712 / collected by the Honourable Sir John Lauder of Fountainhall, one of the..."
revision.text: Possibly: The decisions of the Lords of Council and Session, from June 6th, 1678, to July 30th, 1712 / collected by the Honourable Sir John Lauder of Fountainhall, one of the Senators of the College of Justice ... ; containing also the transactions of the Privy Council, of the Criminal Court, and Court of Exchequer, and interspersed with a variety of historical facts, and many curious anecdotes ; published from the original manuscript, in the Library of the Faculty of Advocates, at their desire. (Edinburgh : Printed for G. Hamilton and J. Balfour, M,DCC,LIX. [1759-1761]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1849806~S1
